Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars - Saga


> (This has something do with the RPG, for the people who complained, not
that
> it was of a bad reason of course, but it will tell you how we 'jetisson
the
> extra weight' around here.
>
> Alloran, when someone is kicked out, it will be both out of the RPG and in
> the RPG.  That means, we will tell him/her she'/he's gone via e-mail or
IM,
> and kill him off in the RPG.  Really no exact way how to kill the
character
> off, maybe an avalanche, tripping on a rock down Mount Everest.
>
> Also, yes, I've noticed a character named "Tocra", which is supposed to be
> Torca.  You can't really blame someone for bad spelling.  Some people,
just
> plain suck at it and can't type the simplest words, ::Hack, cough::.  But,
I
> personally would have to say you just making a character, and making Torca
> good friends with Liono, a mode, unless you discussed it with him.  That's
> like if I made a character who was best friends with Zardus, or said he
was
> Zardus' partner in crime back on Cybertron and try and get him to have
power
> in the Alliance.  To do something like that, you need the permission of
the
> charcacter's owner, unless you make two friends between your own
characters.
>
> PS: Decepticons own.  I'm a Decepticon in every RPG I play, except for
this
> one, because of new rules it no longers allows members of the glorious
> Decepticon Empire.  But Decepticons would've won, except for Galvatron!
How
> Galvatron?  Wouldn't it be more accurately Unicron?  I think not.  Unicron
> was probably going to spare Cybertron, but that idiot who didn't know jack
> about the Matrix tried to use it on Unicron...then he went crazy later in
> 5FoD, and made the Empire collapse.  Blow up Cybertron and Earth, what a
> putz.  As for Rebirth, that is one of the crappiest episodes I've ever
seen.
> Like the Autobots needed the help of the Nebulans to destroy a bunch of
> near-defenseless robots.  They'd just shoot them from a ways away, that's
> what their rifles are for!
